title: Scope of products
context: PART II. ELECTRONIC WASTE RECYCLING Note Sections 339D-2 through 339D-6 designated as part II by L 2009, c 183, ยง4. ยง339D-2 Scope of products. The collection, transportation, and recycling provisions of this part shall apply only to covered electronic devices used and discarded in this State by a covered entity. [L Sp 2008, c 13, pt of ยง2; am L 2009, c 183, ยง9]
